query.prompt:
This text is written in Old English. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Gender, Case, Number, Person, Tense, Mood and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns.
1 On middes wege ðæs lifes weges 9 ic secge ða ðing ðe ic ðær geseah. 28 Þa ic ðone wergan lichomne reste hæfde, 67 He andswarode me: "Nis nan man, man ic wæs iu,
query.result: |Word|Lemma|Part of Speech|Gender|Case|Number|Person|Tense|Mood|Note| |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| |On|on|preposition|||||||| |middes|middes|adjective|||||||| |wege|weg|noun|m.|dative|sg.||||| |ðæs|ðe|demonstrative pronoun||genitive|sg.||||| |lifes|lif|noun|n.|genitive|sg.||||| |weges|weg|noun|m.|genitive|sg.||||| |ic|ic|personal pronoun||nominative|sg.|1|||| |secge|secgan|verb||||1|present|indicative|| |ða|ðe|demonstrative pronoun||accusative|pl.||||| |ðing|ðing|noun|n.|accusative|pl.||||| |ðe|ðe|relative pronoun||accusative|sg.||||| |ic|ic|personal pronoun||nominative|sg.|1|||| |ðær|ðær|adverb|||||||| |geseah|geseon|verb||||1|past|indicative|| |Þa|ða|conjunction|||||||| |ic|ic|personal pronoun||nominative|sg.|1|||| |ðone|ðe|demonstrative pronoun|m.|accusative|sg.||||| |wergan|werig|adjective|m.|accusative|sg.||||| |lichomne|lichama|noun|m.|accusative|sg.||||| |reste|rest|noun|f.|accusative|sg.||||| |hæfde|habban|verb||||1|past|indicative|| |He|he|personal pronoun|m.|nominative|sg.|3|||| |andswarode|andswarian|verb||||3|past|indicative|| |me|me|personal pronoun||dative|sg.|1|||| |Nis|ne|negation|||||||| |nan|nan|indefinite pronoun|m.|nominative|sg.||||| |man|man|noun|m.|nominative|sg.||||| |man|man|noun|m.|nominative|sg.||||| |ic|ic|personal pronoun||nominative|sg.|1|||| |wæs|wesan|verb||||1|past|indicative|| |iu|iu|adverb||||||||
